roleset.name: swear into office
roleset.note: INAUGURATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'inaugurate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from inaugurate.01-v predicate notes)
INAUGURATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, inaugurate.01. No VNcls. (from inauguration.01-n)

example.name: ARG2
example.text: The next day , Chen took advantage of the upcoming presidential inauguration to meet with leaders from a number of countries with which the ROC has diplomatic relations , including the vice-president of El Salvador and the second vice president of Panama .

example.name: arg1
example.text: Well it was n't just campaign promises , he repeated it in his inauguration , when he already had the presidency in hand .

example.name: unk
example.text: We are here today , not just to celebrate an inauguration , but to witness the flowering of hard - won democratic values and the dawn of a new era .

roleset.name: mark the beginning of
roleset.note: INAUGURATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'inaugurate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from inaugurate.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: more agentive than marker
example.text: Since then, Moon's organization has inaugurated a pair of high-quality glossy opinion magazines, The World and I and Insight, which are a further drain.
example.arg: a pair of high-quality glossy opinion magazines, The World and I and Insight, which are a further drain
